Polytechnic University of Turin: The Polytechnic University of Turin (Italian: Politecnico di Torino, abbreviated as PoliTO) is the oldest Italian public technical university.[8] The university offers several courses in the fields of Engineering, Architecture, Urban Planning and Industrial Design,[9] and is consistently ranked as one of the best universities in Italy and in Europe. As of 2023 , it is ranked( QS World University Rankings ) 26th worldwide for Mechanical Engineering, 15th for Petroleum Engineering, 28th for Architecture and is among the top 50 (#45th) engineering universities in the world.[10]
